title: Kirchhoff junction - 3x current when switch closes

content.question: Which of the following circuits could result in the graph shown?

choices.label: The figure shows a circuit diagram with two horizontal branches and three vertical branches containing a battery, switch, and three identical resistors of resistance R. The battery has e m f script uppercase E, and is located on the left vertical branch. From the top down, the middle vertical branch has switch S and then a resistor. The right vertical branch splits into two vertical subbranches, each of which contain a resistor.
